table_description: Information about environment group descriptions, including ID, name, owner, service links, and timestamps.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the environment group.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the environment group.

columns.name: ownerId
columns.description: The ID of the owner of the environment group.

columns.name: createdAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the environment group was created.

columns.name: updatedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update to the environment group.

columns.name: serviceLinks
columns.description: A list of service links associated with the environment group.

columns.name: environmentId
columns.description: The ID of the associated environment.
